数据{{deleteText}}后不可恢复，请谨慎操作: Note that the data cannot be recovered once it is deleted.
该操作不可逆，数据删除后不能恢复，请谨慎操作，是否确认删除？: Are you sure you want to delete the data? Note that the data cannot be recovered once it is deleted.
颜色值使用十六进制表示法，例如“#ffffff”表示纯白色，其中“#”后面跟着六: Select a color from the picker, or enter a custom hex color code, for example “#ffffff”.
数值必须为数字: The data value must be a number.
收入必须为数字: The income value must be a number.
支出必须为数字: The expenditure value must be a number.
颜色必须是#后面跟6位16进制的数字: The color value must be a string consisting of # followed by 6 hexadecimal digits.
不保存到快速选择名称中: Do not add it to Tasks
数值字段最终会表现在数据统计中。: The data value will be reflected in data statistics.
您可以用它来表示任何值，如“体重、工时、存款、消费”等，数据统计中会展示趋势和累: The number in the data field represents values such as your weight, working hours, savings, or consumption. It is used to show you long-term trends.
开始日期、开始时间、结束日期、结束时间用于数据统计中计算累计时长。: The start date, start time, due date, and due time are used to calculate the cumulative duration in data statistics.
如果快速选择名称中颜色与此颜色不同，优先使用快速选择名称内配置的颜色。: The color configured in the selected name takes precedence if it is different from this color.
日历中长按日期方格可以直接跳转到该页面: Long press the date square in the calendar to redirect to this page.
计划名称字数不能超过64个字符: The task name cannot exceed 64 characters.
计划次数必填且必须大于0: The goal must be a number greater than 0.
表示本月准备完成“xx”计划多少次，打卡时应该使用该计划名称，这样每一次打卡之后: This indicates how many times you plan to complete the task this month. Please use the task name for record, so that the progress of the task can be updated properly.
点击记录名称筛选查询: Tap the task name to filter
年视图下最多同时选中4个选项: Up to 4 options can be selected in the Year view
查询时间超过一年: The time range cannot exceed one year.
点击下方高亮的[累计数值]可以切换统计数据。: Tap the cumulative Data at the bottom right to switch the stats.
数值是根据记录中的[数值]字段汇总而得出；时长通过记录中的“开始日期、开始时间，: The Data comes from the data field. The duration is calculated based on the start date, start time, due date, and due time in the record.
提醒时间未选择: The reminder time is not selected.
默认生日当天会提醒: Defaults to remind on the birthday
由于你还没配置接受生日提醒的邮件地址，请先在个人信息中配置好邮箱地址后再进行该操: Please configure your email first to receive birthday reminders.
开始时间和结束时间不能只出现一个: Both the start time and due time are required.
当配置了数值、收入、支出、开始时间、结束时间后，下次快速选择时会自动填充这些值。: The fields for Data, Income, Expenditure, Start time, and Due time will be automatically filled in the next time you select the task.
重复动作{{stepCount}}次，每次间隔{{stepTime}}秒，全部完: Repeat {{stepCount}} times with an interval of {{stepTime}} seconds. Rest for {{restTime}} seconds after all are completed.
请添加至少一个执行子项: Please add at least one subtask.
次数必填且不能为0: The goal is required and cannot be 0.
每次用时必填且不能为0: The time for each movement is required and cannot be 0.
暂无子项，请点击底部按钮新增: No subtasks available. Tap the button to create a subtask.
节日名称名称字数不能超过64个字符: The holiday name cannot exceed 64 characters.
节日简称字数不能超过4个字符: The holiday short name cannot exceed 4 characters.
持续天数必填: The duration of days is required.
该节日仅展示在个人的日历中，其他用户并不可见。: The holiday is displayed only in your calendar and not visible to other users.
结束日期必须大于等于开始日期: The end date must be later than the start date.
间隔周期指两次开始时间的间隔天数，比如第一次是1月1日开始，第二次是1月29日开: The menstrual cycle is counted from the first day of one period to the first day of the next. "First period" and "Second period" are just for helping calculate the period cycle. If you already know the exact number of days, you can directly enter the period cycle.
首页展示开启后将在首页通过不同颜色的日期来展示: After it is enabled, the dates of the following periods are displayed in different colors on the home page.
事件标题字数不能超过12个字符: The task name cannot exceed 12 characters.
在表单中输入对方共享码绑定后，可以在自己的打卡视图中使用对方的数据，但对方并不能: When you enter another user's share code and bind, you can use the user's data on your Tasks, but the user cannot use your tasks. To achieve data sharing between you and another user, you can exchange and bind each other's share codes.
请输入问题或建议: Please enter your questions or suggestions
感谢您一直以来对我们的支持和信任！我们一直在努力为您提供更好的产品，而您的意见对: Thanks for your support. Your feedback is important to us.
便签内容不能超过200个字符: The note content cannot exceed 200 characters.
是否将该事件添加到打卡视图中: Are you sure you want to add the task to your calendar?
共 {{listLen}} 组任务 / 第 {{taskIndex}} 组: Total of {{listLen}} sets of tasks / Set {{taskIndex}}
您可以在此创建一个共享日历，该日历的数据会独立于首页的日历保存，在这个日历中你可: Create a shared calendar separated from the one shown on the home page. You can invite other users to cooperate in this calendar, such as guest room booking, meeting room reservation, and other multi-user collaboration.
